room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Louisville in Louisville
review: We took part in the Haunted Mansion - and it was great! The Breakout employees were as excited as we were about our venture and our success! We would definitely recommend this to other families. Thanks Breakout!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Louisville in Louisville
review: Mystery Mansion had some good brain teasers and cool props. Glad it wasn't my first rodeo or we might not have escaped. Got out with 3 minutes to spare!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Louisville in Louisville
review: I wasn't sure what to expect, since I had never done this before, but the girl in our group that had said it would be fun. And she was totally right! It was so challenging, but fun at the same time! With a last minute group effort, we unlocked the door with 20 seconds to spare! We will be back for another challenge! Thank you Jillian (game master) for the helpful hints and getting us out in time!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Louisville in Louisville
review: we did mystery mansion and it was so much fun. Chris ( the game master for that room) was awesome and very friendly.

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Louisville in Louisville
review: I recently visited Breakout Louisville for a date and we had an amazing time. We participated in the Mystery Mansion room and though we didnâ€™t completely make it out, we had a good time with each other as well as the other players in the room. When we would get stuck on the game, our awesome game proctor, Jillian would give us little hints to help us get to the next clue. We appreciate you Jillian!!! I highly recommend this location for a cool date night!
